meanings.sent1: He enjoyed smoking panatelas on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman lit up a panatela after dinner.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was surprised to see a cat playing with a panatela.

meanings.definition: A type of cigar that is typically mild in flavor.
meanings.sent1: She preferred the smooth taste of panatelas over stronger cigars.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper recommended the panatelas to customers looking for a milder option.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that even the toughest cowboys couldn't handle the mildness of a panatela.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and pleasant as the flavor of a panatela.
meanings.sent5: The gentle aroma of the panatela filled the room with a sense of relaxation.
